title: You know those "Enemy [CHAMP] vs. Our [CHAMP]" memes?
body:
Well let's do those with our mains. I'll go first.

Enemy Poppy:
http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/524904779539308493/0696703C45A64605B8901AE76E010571E89752CD/?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside%7C637:358&composite-to=*,*%7C637:358&background-color=black

Our Poppy:
http://www.denimblog.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/mc-hammer.jpg

Is that a boosted ape?

http://www.ridingbrazil.de/bilder/pantanal-farm-aufenthalt/kaiman-baby-pantanal-brasilien.jpg

Enemy Galio:

http://i13.photobucket.com/albums/a293/toolbox1234/weeping-angels_l.jpg

Our Galio:

http://www.loupiote.com/photos_m/771631183-gargoyle-catacombes-de-paris-catacombs-off-limit-area.jpg

Wait a second. If we do it with our mains, normally when we have one on our team it'd be US playing them, not somebody else.

THIS IS A PLOY TO HAVE US MAKE FUN OF OURSELVES, ISN'T IT?
Uh... STOP. HAMMERTIME!

You are a disgrace to Poppy mains, the appropriate response would be:

**_BOOP_**

*ehem*
That's {{champion:136}}, not {{champion:78}}.

*sigh*


It's from an anime, I see you don't understand, and I pity you.

Well you can't expect everyone in the world to know about every anime in the world.

Also, {{champion:136}} does actually say "[boop](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/cc/AurelionSol.spellI1.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20160309222357)" when he hits someone with a star.

> [{quoted}](name=Twitch Main,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oadh1tJy,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2016-08-21T22:53:31.362+0000)
>
> Wait a second. If we do it with our mains, normally when we have one on our team it'd be US playing them, not somebody else.
> 
> THIS IS A PLOY TO HAVE US MAKE FUN OF OURSELVES, ISN'T IT?

I beleave, he meant how it would look if others would play our mains :3

Ally Sona: http://makingmusicfun.net/images/thumbs/au-clair-de-la-lune-piano-solo.jpg

My Sona: {{item:3145}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} 
https://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/59517140.jpg
Hey if I may ask is there an item I should get to replace the Rapid Firecannon or Shiv since their passives don't stack anymore?
you sure? they don't have the same passive name, then replace shiv with either rabadon, void staff, or {{item:3115}}
Yeah, unfortunately a bunch of ADCs, most notably Vayne, were just rushing Rapid Firecannon into Shiv and abusing the high damage from both procs as well as the extra range from RFC...

> [{quoted}](name=Sona x Rubick,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oadh1tJy,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2016-08-21T22:22:18.725+0000)
